abstract: Richard Ruzika, head of the investment bank’s special situations group, is retiring from the Wall Street bank. He will be replaced by Jason Brown.
snippet: Richard Ruzika, head of the investment bank’s special situations group, is retiring from the Wall Street bank. He will be replaced by Jason Brown.
lead_paragraph: Richard Ruzika, the influential Goldman Sachs executive who runs the firm’s special situations group, is retiring from the Wall Street bank, according to a memo sent last week to employees.
